Until April 2023, I was an Economist at the Bank of Italy. In 2022, I received a PhD in Finance from the LSE, working under the supervision of Daniel Paravisini and Dirk Jenter.
Here you can find my academic CV (or see here for a one-page version).
You can contact me via email at marcopelosi [at] gmail [dot] com.
